FAQs Page

Frequently asked questions

How much is the upfont fees?

We do not charge up Upfront Fees for any given service provided by us. We thrive in honesty and transparency.

How much is consultation fees

We do not charge for consultation. It is absolutly Free for any one!. Reach-out to our service desk at any time by Email: Service Desk

Do you offer support ?

We offer both Onsite and Remote Support to all our clients.

What are the payment methods available?

We currently have Paypal transfers, Mobile payments (Airtel money and Mpesa) and Electronic bank transfers.

Which countries do you opperate from ?

Rwanda, Tanzania, Malawi, South Africa, Zambia, Kenya, Uganda, UK, USA, UAE, Qatar, Oman, Saudi Arabia, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Egypt, Ghana, Lesotho and Mozambique.

How do I get started ?

You can easily get started by either filling this 👉 form or sending us a detailed email to getstarted@smartsolutions4u.com

Are there any job openings ?

We are constantly looking for top skilled programmers, graphic designers and social media managers. We are constantly growing our team so we can serve our clients better and meet emerging market needs.

How we help business?

We go the extra mile to 100% satisfy the client and ensure project success. With our team of experienced professionals and skilled developers, graphic designers and team players we guarantee you the best from the best.

Our value propositions ?

We run a great team of designers and developers who are dedicatated and passionate and hold proven track records from the best institutions countrywide. Our quality is unbeatable you will definately like each and every design we make. we guarantee quality of work and service 100%. We are good at what we do.
